TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
So , that was you?
https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-57965260

Obviously had been granted, but should it?

 

I wish to have a ghost-like form to enable on my wish.

Granted. If I understood the wish. You wish to die and come back as ghost?

The tank had no tracks and was stuck in a basement so I don't think it was a risk to anybody. The torpedo is a different matter.

I wish to fly like an Eagle.

43 minutes ago, ColdJ said:

I wish to fly like an Eagle.

Granted. You are flying to the moon with no support.

43 minutes ago, ColdJ said:

If I understood the wish. You wish to die and come back as ghost?

No. I wish to have a form when I can invisibly visit various places.

On demand, of course.

Granted. But it needs to signed in triplicate.

I wish that the moon was the international space station.

Overgranted. It's an interstellar one. They hide inside.

I wish for CST-100 docking video.

Granted. Boeing turns into a rocket company and half of the flying planes go extinct. The economy corrupts.

I wish I had some Fanta right now

Edited July 30, 2021 by Aerodynamic Kerbal
NINJA'D MOMENT

What we have here is a Ninja situation, so,

@kerbiloid

@Aerodynamic Kerbal Granted. You get diabetes and your teeth fallout.

I wish you have seen the movie "Moon" with Sam Rockwell.

1 minute ago, ColdJ said:

I wish you have seen the movie "Moon" with Sam Rockwell.

It's an extended cut, including every daily activity of every previous Sam Bell in real time.

12 minutes ago, ColdJ said:

Granted. But it needs to signed in triplicate.

I wish that the moon was the international space station.

But to access it a probe needs to be sent there, sent back, queried, lost in deep space, found, subjected to public enquiry, lost again, and buried in soft peat for three months and recycled as aluminium flakes for solid fuel.

13 minutes ago, Aerodynamic Kerbal said:

I wish I had some Fanta right now

You find a 65-year-old unopened bottle of Fanta. Unfortunately it's completely trashed so you can't sell it as an antique at high enough prices to recover your money spent on finding it.

2 minutes ago, OrdinaryKerman said:

But to access it a probe needs to be sent there, sent back, queried, lost in deep space, found, subjected to public enquiry, lost again, and buried in soft peat for three months and recycled as aluminium flakes for solid fuel.

Very nice Hitch Hikers reference. Don't mind me, I was never here, carry on.

505 wish does not exist error. Assuming wish:

Granted. You are not minded so much you fade from existence.

 

I wish a wish would have been made in one of the previous two posts that wasn't already granted.

Granted. The wishes were for another good Quote and for a high process GPU for OrdinaryKerman to make 3d models on.

@Dientus

I wish the moon was hiding a great big spaceship just under the crust.

Granted, but its loaded with decepticons!

i wish i was a better wisher of wishes that would wish for wishes that wished for wished that could wish for wishes that wished wishes.

112507302021

I would grant it but I lost track halfway through. 
I wish for a Friday show and tell

Granted.

At a kindergarten class somewhere there is a nice little show and tell going on today.

 

I wish to be able to repair cars by simply touching them.

Granted. You collapse the global automotive industry by eliminating the demand for skilled mechanics and send us into a worldwide economic depression.

I wish for a potato.

Granted. Irish people make a world war, just to get the potato and the world gets destroyed as Jacksepticeye uses "Pink Lightning" from Turbo Dismount.

I wish for a Sprite.

Granted. A sprite appears in your room and attacks you.

I wish you distinguished the sprite, the sprite, and the sprite.

Granted. The sprite wins a distinguished sprite award.

I wish for a potato that doesn't cause a world war.

Granted, Instead the potato establishes a communist totalitarian  government and starts a atomic weapon program, starting a deadly nuclear standoff.

I wish for a cold glass of Dr. Pepper

Granted.

It is second in command of the aformentioned communist totalitarian government.

I wish to be on the next Spaceship Two flight.

Granted. It never flies again.

I wish for a peaceful, non-political potato.

Granted.

The potato is revered by many worldwide. Songs are written, religions are formed, people get together and sing kumbaya over the Great Potato and even children talk to the potato and loving terms before your eyes. Do you dare eat the potato now?

 

I wish to see how this ends.

Granted. I get the potato I want.

I wish for a peaceful, non-political, non-venerated potato.

Granted.

But it took you to long so it is rotten.

I wish for @Dman979's potato to not be rotten.

Granted. You've corrupted Dientus' wish.

I wish for a fresh, peaceful, non-political, non-venerated potato.
